chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s1: state
p: proc A
sc: schedule
s2: state
q: proc A
P: state -> proc A -> Prop

Goal:
always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P

Premises:
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
alw_envs : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc B) (k : B -> proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
pstep_safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc' s...
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A ->...-> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
network_rely' = fun (w : world) (this : nid) => fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : world -> nid -> nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments network_rely' _ _ _%nat_scope
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
stepUnfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
with_inv_step : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2

```coq
intros.
apply alw_envs with (s2:=s2) (P:=P); auto.
apply pstep_network_sem with (t:=p) (sc:=sc); auto.
Qed.

original: intros. apply alw_envs with (s2:=s2) (P:=P); auto. apply pstep_network_sem with (t:=p) (sc:=sc); auto.
